title: My friend who signed up for the alpha build can't play custom and aram games anymore with me.
body: He says he spams the accept button when I send an invite to him but it would not let him in the game lobby.And so we can't play customs and arams together anymore.I don't know if it's the client that's doing that or something else but I would really appreciate it if you found a solution for that problem of him or the client.Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Custom matches aren't *enabled* in the Alpha Client just yet, so that would be why he cannot play those specific types of matches with you. Regarding his issue playing ARAMs, I'd have to have more context to understand what's going on. Can you direct your friend to these boards and have him make his own post so we can work this out?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lzsGNAV9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-07T03:30:00.056+0000)
>
> Custom matches aren't *enabled* in the Alpha Client just yet, so that would be why he cannot play those specific types of matches with you. Regarding his issue playing ARAMs, I'd have to have more context to understand what's going on. Can you direct your friend to these boards and have him make his own post so we can work this out?

Clubs are enabled if im correct, though i can't find them.
